      • init

        public static void init(int logLevel,
                        java.lang.String logOutputFile,
                        boolean box2D,
                        boolean bullet)
        Used to initialize all necessary libraries for RivelWorks to function (Logger, Audio, Box2D, Bullet).
        Parameters:
        logLevel - The level of logging to display.
        logOutputFile - The file to log to.
        box2D - Should Box2D be initialized?
        bullet - Should JBullet be initialized?
